kpi_info.title: 2G TFO peak
kpi_info.use: The highest number of simultaneously active TFO services for connections under 2G TFO licence in which MGW has participated in the TFO codec negotiations. This counter shows the largest value of the TFO_CURRENT counter during one result accumulation period for connections under 2G TFO licence in one physical MGW. 2G TFO includes codecs GSM HR, GSM FR, and GSM EFR
